short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows the user to copy the LinkedIn li_at cookie.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get your li_at cookie from your account.

This Chrome browser extension allows easy retrieval of LinkedIn session cookies (li_at) when using Airscale. Install the extension for seamless use of Airscale.
After logging in to LinkedIn,  the extension retrieves session cookies for your LinkedIn account automatically. 

 Simply click on the extension, copy and paste your session cookie to Airscale.

Learn more about Airscale at https://airscale.io
